body:
Hi Mostapha, Chris and group members,



An error "1. Solution exception:'NoneType' object has no attribute 'Faces'" in the Bioclimatic Chart made me confused, when importing Lhasa's (Location in China) epw file was fine. 



Is it the problem of weather file (SWERA) searched from epwmap website, or something else?



Thank you in advance.



Xiaojian
topic: Bioclimatic Chart Error with epw file

replies.body:
Bi,

Attached a fixed version.

Some data on the DryBulbTemperature is faulty and it was causing the Bioclimate component to crash.

I fixed it here. I'll upload to the github soon.

-A.

Hi Abraham,



Thank you for your immediate reply. It really did work. Thank you again.



Xiaojian
